title: Public Toilets
description: Manually converted from JSON Table Schema at https://github.com/esd-org-uk/schemas/blob/master/PublicToilets/PublicToilets.json

ExtractDate.description: The date that the data was last extracted from its source database or manually updated

OrganisationURI.description: URI from ODC of publishing organisation

OrganisationLabel.description: Label of publishing organisation. If empty uses this will be the same as the publishing organisation

ServiceTypeLabel.description: Label of the Service Type URI

LocationText.description: Name of building, street, park etc.

GeoX.description: Longitude or east grid reference for centroid of application boundary

GeoY.description: Latitude or north grid reference for centroid of application boundary

GeoPointLicensingURL.description: URL of any page that describes any licensing restrictions on using the northing and easting.

RADARKeyNeeded.description: Flag to show whether a RADAR Key is needed

BabyChange.description: Flag to show whether there are baby changing facilities

FamilyToilet.description: Flag to show whether there is a family toilet

ChangingPlace.description: Flag to indicate whether the toilet includes changing facilities for people with profound and multiple learning disabilities and their carers, as well as many other disabled people. See http://www.changing-places.org/

AutomaticPublicConvenience.description: Flag to indicate whether this is an automatic public convenience (aka superloo)

FullTimeStaffing.description: Flag to indicate whether there is full time staffing

PartOfCommunityScheme.description: Flag to indicate whether it is part of a community scheme

CommunitySchemeName.description: The name of the community scheme

ChargeAmount.description: Charge amount in GBP to two decimal places. Omit the currency symbol

InfoURL.description: URL of web page describing the facilities

ManagedBy.description: Name of organisation managing the toilet

Notes.description: Notes on reporting, accessibility, hours or anything else

UPRN.description: Unique Property Reference Number of the toilet

GeoAreaURI.description: A predefined spatial area that the application is contained in.  Note that these can be derived from X/Y coordinates. Comma delimit in spreadsheet where there is more than one

GeoAreaLabel.description: Labels of the Geo Area URI. Comma delimit in spreadsheet where there is more than one
